column1: #Text=Mako says : " We need to get into the temple .
#Text=" Lieutenant says : " What are you two doing here ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Uh , we were just transferred .
#Text=" Lieutenant says : " Well , you 're getting transferred again .
#Text=Amon wants extra security at the arena today .
#Text=" Korra says : " We 'll be there , sir .
